summary: A famous couple is going on stage after ten years of separation and hate.
cast: Josiane Balasko|Richard Berry|Daniel Prévost|Daniel Ceccaldi|Claude Berri|Nadia Barentin|Philippe Bruneau|Jean-Claude Bouillon|Nicolas Silberg|Jean Sarrus|Jean-Michel Tinivelli|Fabienne Barbey|Michel Field|Stéphane Butet|Virginie Bombasano|Christine Culerier|Aida Daghari|Jacques Delaporte|Nicolas Di Tullio|Valeria Dos Santos|Françoise Gazio|Lilianne Mazaud|Michel Perret|Yvette Petit|Sandra Proes|Hélène Raimbault|Abdel Soufi
title: Un grand cri d'amour
